short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension changes the background on the new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our Chrome extension is designed to transform the background image on new tabs with captivating pet-related images. With just a click, you can surround yourself with adorable cats, dogs, and other beloved pets. But that's not all! Our extension also offers a Custom Web Search feature, allowing you to conveniently search the web directly from your new tab.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Best Pics Tab Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use- https://bestpicstab.com/terms-of-use) and Privacy Policy (https://bestpicstab.com/privacy-policy)
